desc: Shop online with Crafty Remnants and you'll soon you'll be crafting 100% of your own creations for friends, family and personal fabric and home interior projects. With a range of fabric remnants from high end interior designers at low cost prices. order today and get your delivery next week!

layout.text: At Crafty Remnants we help you craft your own bespoke design pieces.
Craft your own quilts, masks, soft furnishings and more. We recommend you start with a cushion.
Start crafting today with the most beautiful fabric remnants, stored and shipped from Northern Ireland.
